mapinfo.detailsText:
Players are on equal footing on this region full of every resource.
 During the cold season the map is covered with snow and the water partially freezes.
 Different trade routes move from different spots but they all head toward the sea.
 
 Native Civs: Cree / Huron 
 Mercenaries: Comanchero / Pirate 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
